name: root
description: Essential packages to build, release, and run great software

scripts.audit: npm audit && lerna --no-bail exec --ignore $npm_package_config_lerna_ignore -- npm audit
scripts.audit:prod: npm audit --only=prod && lerna --no-bail exec --ignore $npm_package_config_lerna_ignore -- npm audit --only=prod
scripts.docs:make: npm run docs:make:api && cd docs && npm run build
scripts.postdocs:make:api:
echo "---
id: api
title: API
sidebar_position: 4
---
$(cat $npm_package_config_docsApi)" > $npm_package_config_docsApi
scripts.docs:publish: cd docs && env-cmd --fallback -f .env.${NODE_ENV} npm run deploy
scripts.lerna:ci: npm ci && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap
scripts.outdated: npm outdated && lerna exec --ignore $npm_package_config_lerna_ignore -- npm outdated
scripts.outdated:prod: npm outdated --only=prod && lerna exec --ignore $npm_package_config_lerna_ignore -- npm outdated --only=prod

author: Matt Norris <matnorri@cisco.com>
